mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, DR_NO, DR_NAME, DR_ID, DR_BIRTH, DR_PHONE, DR_EMAIL, DR_PROFILE, DR_POINT, DR_POSTCODE, DR_ADDRESS, HP_NAME, HPCATE_NAME, DR_APPROVAL, DR_ENROLL_DATE, DR_STATUS FROM (SELECT DR_NO, DR_ID, DR_NAME, DR_BIRTH, DR_PHONE, DR_EMAIL, DR_PROFILE, DR_POINT, DR_POSTCODE, DR_ADDRESS, HP_NAME, HPCATE_NAME, DR_APPROVAL, DR_ENROLL_DATE, DR_STATUS FROM DRCLIENT D JOIN HOSPITAL HP ON(D.HP_NO = HP.HP_NO) JOIN HPCATEGORY HPC ON(D.HPCATE_CODE = HPC.HPCATE_CODE) ORDER BY DR_NO DESC)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DR_NO, DR_ID,DR_NAME, DR_BIRTH, DR_PHONE, DR_EMAIL, DR_PROFILE, DR_POINT, DR_POSTCODE, DR_ADDRESS, HP_NAME, HPCATE_NAME, DR_APPROVAL, DR_ENROLL_DATE, DR_STATUS FROM DRCLIENT D JOIN HOSPITAL HP ON(D.HP_NO = HP.HP_NO) JOIN HPCATEGORY HPC ON(D.HPCATE_CODE = HPC.HPCATE_CODE)
AND DR_NO = #{drNo}
AND DR_NAME LIKE '%' || #{userName} || '%'
ORDER BY DR_ENROLL_DATE DESC)
